(:action catch ; Catch an entity and update its status
    :parameters (?p - player ?e - entity ?loc - location ?item - object)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?p ?loc)
        (at ?e ?loc)
        (not (inventory ?p ?e))
        (or (not (inventory ?p ?item)) (inventory ?p ?item))
    )
    :effect (and
        (inventory ?p ?e)
        (not (at ?e ?loc))

(:action train ; Train an entity and update its status
  :parameters (?trainer - agent ?entity - entity)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?trainer ?entity) (untrained ?entity))
  :effect (and (trained ?entity))

(:action go ; Move an entity from one location to another
:parameters (?entity - thing ?from - location ?to - location)
:precondition (and (at ?entity ?from) (connected ?from ?to))
:effect (and (at ?entity ?to) (not (at ?entity ?from))

(:action copy ; Copy a resource and update inventory status
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?resource - object ?location - place)
  :precondition (and (at ?actor ?location) (not (has ?actor ?resource)))
  :effect (has ?actor ?resource)
)

(:action evolve ; Evolve an entity and update state
:parameters (?entity - object ?evolved_form - object)
:precondition (and (evolved ?entity) (not (inventory ?evolved_form)))
:effect (and (not (inventory ?entity))
